Better Search Views
===================



> **Warning**
> 
> 
> * You need to reload Obsidian after you **install/update/enable/disable** the plugin
> * The plugin reaches into Obsidian's internals, so it may break after an update. If you noticed that, [please create an issue](https://github.com/ivan-lednev/better-search-views/issues)


How to use it
-------------


Just install it and reload Obsidian. Now Obsidian's built-in global search, backlinks and queries should be decorated with breadcrumbs.


What it does
------------


### Before 'Better Search Views', search results look like this:


[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/292629983-4069c2ef-6ec9-4a87-9881-2d300cddd10e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..qrL7BwhEPXVPH8EFuPNjWbYMaiEADSK2_angiqbNDGU)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/292629983-4069c2ef-6ec9-4a87-9881-2d300cddd10e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..qrL7BwhEPXVPH8EFuPNjWbYMaiEADSK2_angiqbNDGU)


### After 'Better Search Views' they look like this:


[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/292630010-b191f14a-b75c-46d9-a19c-a8f91cafcd9f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.._t6lokZcu-weUcXMK_E-70hQ4a62HXwqbPNN7ptKVN0)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/292630010-b191f14a-b75c-46d9-a19c-a8f91cafcd9f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.._t6lokZcu-weUcXMK_E-70hQ4a62HXwqbPNN7ptKVN0)


### A closer look


Let's open one of the files with matches, and see how the hierarchy in the search result matches the file:
[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/292630304-953b2de2-cc9a-496c-ad85-27f0c361424a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..4sTvJTe9bTkwdsrRXaQqiw7OY1A9qO4c8RI_HcNlpIQ)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/292630304-953b2de2-cc9a-496c-ad85-27f0c361424a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..4sTvJTe9bTkwdsrRXaQqiw7OY1A9qO4c8RI_HcNlpIQ)


### But what does it do exactly?


The plugin brings more outliner goodness into Obsidian: it improves search views to create an outliner-like context around every match.


* **It patches native search, backlinks view, embedded backlinks and embedded queries**
* It renders markdown in the match to HTML
* It builds structural breadcrumbs to the match by chaining all the ancestor headings and list items above
* If the match is in a list item, it displays all the sub-list items below it
* If the match is in a heading, it displays the first section below the heading (you know, for context)


### Backlinks in document look like this


[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/255157901-2f5229bc-8d3d-4027-b01c-fa36d5872716.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..TCHNBJiS6Ao6t8OzBYqhD_pu9z1WdGZXT1OCGZ_Twfs)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/255157901-2f5229bc-8d3d-4027-b01c-fa36d5872716.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..TCHNBJiS6Ao6t8OzBYqhD_pu9z1WdGZXT1OCGZ_Twfs)


### Embedded queries look like this


[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/255175809-bdf7fb5d-dcc2-4067-9abb-9c2064c09a27.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rQr-L6yF1E8k7_tm4q_WhnuCIhrLW_DTk--7M-IXm9g)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41428836/255175809-bdf7fb5d-dcc2-4067-9abb-9c2064c09a27.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rQr-L6yF1E8k7_tm4q_WhnuCIhrLW_DTk--7M-IXm9g)


### Clicking on breadcrumbs works just as you might expect


[![](/ivan-lednev/better-search-views/raw/master/click-demo.gif)](/ivan-lednev/better-search-views/blob/master/click-demo.gif)


### Hovering over any element with the control key pressed triggers a pop-up


[![](/ivan-lednev/better-search-views/raw/master/hover-demo.gif)](/ivan-lednev/better-search-views/blob/master/hover-demo.gif)


Contribution
------------


If you noticed a bug or have an improvement idea, [please create an issue](https://github.com/ivan-lednev/better-search-views/issues).


Pull-requests are welcome! If you want to contribute but don't know where to start, you can create an issue or write me an email: [bishop1860@gmail.com](mailto:bishop1860@gmail.com).


You can also support the development directly:


[![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/cace41b0afc90c68d0207e2bd809ee121f9ff4f72ac032e8ced972aee7adbb23/68747470733a2f2f63646e2e6275796d6561636f666665652e636f6d2f627574746f6e732f76322f64656661756c742d79656c6c6f772e706e67)](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/machineelf)


Acknowledgements
================


* Thanks to [TFTHacker](https://tfthacker.com/) for [his plugin](https://github.com/TfTHacker/obsidian42-strange-new-worlds), which helped me figure out how to implement a bunch of small improvements
* Thanks to [NothingIsLost](https://github.com/nothingislost) for his awesome plugins, that helped me figure out how to patch Obsidian internals
* Thanks to [PJEby](https://github.com/pjeby) for his [patching library](https://github.com/pjeby/monkey-around)
